name: Star Fox in Unity
teaser: A clone of the first stage of Star Fox I programmed to learn Unity

name: ASCII 3D-Cube
teaser: A cube demo in C I programmed to learn computer graphics
description: This is a little cube demo I programmed purely in C to learn the basics of Computer Graphics in my free time. It basically works with "Voxels" (although in this case naming them 3D-pixels would be better), that are "flattened" to a plane with the so called camera matrix I learned from in a lecture. It took me a week to finish (and one minor, random look a year later for a bug I was unable to find back then üòÅ).

name: ASCII Water
teaser: A shallow water simulation in C inspired by ZSNES's menu screen
description: This is a simulation of water on a surface based on the wave equation. Implemented in C.

name: Cable Simulation
teaser: My bachelor thesis which was a cable simulation in Unity
description: This is a simulation for a cable I implemented for my Bachelor Thesis. It can be run by two algorithms. The first one bases on Jakobsen's Advanced Character Physics Model and the second one on (Extended) Position Based Dynamics.

name: Klara
teaser: An RPG game about Marie whose sister is kidnapped
description: This is a game I've been working on during the last two years (with long pauses and some intense working periods, depending on how much time I had). The game is largely story based. I built it in RPG Maker 2003. It is not finished yet, but there are about one to two hours worth of gameplay.

name: Petra & The Wolves
teaser: A very small project I finished along with a Unity tutorial
description: This is a little microgame I programmed as an exercise for an Unity Tutorial. I downloaded the assets from the Unity Store. It took me a week to finish working six hours each day.

name: Text Performer
teaser: A text processor aimed at creative SEO writers
description: Text Performer is a Word Processor made for SEO writers. It's a project I built from the ground up for my old job at pagebeaker. The idea is by Ralf Schulte. It supports spell checking, export & import to proprietary formats, SEO-analysation tools, filler removal, detection of word repetitions and more. Its release is planned soon.
